resources.string: Alarms and timers using this sound will play the default sound instead.
The sound content cannot be accessed.
Your missed alarm has been deleted

string-array.name: alarm_set
string-array.item: Alarm set for less than 1 minute from now.
Alarm set for %1$s and %2$s from now.
Alarm set for %1$s and %3$s from now.
Alarm set for %2$s and %3$s from now.
Alarm set for %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s from now.

resources.string: Device is set to total silence

string-array.name: sw_share_strings
string-array.item: Enjoy the fruits of your labor.
Androids are known to be fast, but not as fast as you!
Let\'s do the time warp again.
Just a jump to the left.
You have a palette for haste.

resources.string: While traveling in an area where the time is different, add a clock for home
Swipe left to snooze or right to dismiss
Opens the main Android screensaver settings
Set an alarm to access this setting
No alarm scheduled for this time
%s alarm can\'t be dismissed yet, still more than 24 hours away
Your bedtime stops at %1$s after %2$s of sleep.
only important calls can reach you
Do not disturb for bedtime mode
Only calls from starred contacts, repeat callers, and alarms can reach you
Make your wallpaper darker. App icons, widgets, and notifications won\'t be affected

Reminder: 

Enable this setting, otherwise the alarm may not trigger if all sounds are muted.

Reminder: 

Disable this setting, otherwise the alarm may not trigger if the screen is off.

Reminder: 

Enable this setting, otherwise alarm, timer and stopwatch notifications will not be displayed. Moreover, the alarm may not trigger.

Reminder: 

Enable this setting, otherwise the alarm will not trigger when the screen is off.
